NL: Find the total revenue generated by campaigns that were successful, defined as campaigns with an actual spent less than the budget.
List the product display names and their associated supplier reference IDs for all products that are currently active.
Retrieve the campaign name, start date, and end date for all email campaigns that have an open rate greater than 20%.
Find all female customers above 40 years old with more than 1000 loyalty points.
Query:
SELECT * FROM customerinfo
WHERE person_gender = 'female' AND person_date_of_birth <= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE, INTERVAL 40 YEAR) AND person_loyalty_points > 1000;
